sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Afrikaans: Die oorlogskreet vir geregtigheid was verby - baie tot die chagrin van die owerhede.
backtrans: The war cry for justice was over - many to the Chagrin of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Afrikaans: Die regime se besluit adumbreer die onderliggende agenda.
backtrans: The regime's decision Adumbrate the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Afrikaans: Die gemeenskap was angstig oor die verloop van die broodnodige hervormings.
backtrans: The community was anxious about the course of much needed reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Afrikaans: Die denktenk het 'n papier gepubliseer waarin hul verskoning van die doodstraf uiteengesit het.
backtrans: The think tank published a paper in which their excuse of the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Afrikaans: Aught was van die petisie se geldigheid
backtrans: Aught was of the petition's validity

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Afrikaans: Die president het sy ministers vermaan om op te staan as sleutel opposisie ondersteuning vir sy ekonomiese plan is op die punt om te buig.
backtrans: The president admonished his ministers to stand up as key opposition support for his economic plan is about to bend.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Afrikaans: Die kiesers was chuffed om te sien dat die wetsontwerp geslaag het.
backtrans: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Afrikaans: Die prokureur se diskursiewe vertelling het die jurie geswaai.
backtrans: The lawyer's discursive narrative swung the jury.

Afrikaans: Die hof het die geweld aangebring!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Afrikaans: Die EU-blok het 'n uiteindelike oplegging van anti-dumping maatreëls gekant.
backtrans: The EU block opposed an ultimate imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Afrikaans: 'N Vulige eulogie is deur die Sly-raad gelewer.
backtrans: A Fully Eulogy was delivered by the Sly Board.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Afrikaans: Die gig-ekonomie-agentskap het besluit om die terugbetalings te versier!
backtrans: The Gig economy agency decided to decorate the repayments!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Afrikaans: Lede van die anti-teokratiese revolusionêre beweging het die eweknieë in krag omvergewerp!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrown the peers!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Afrikaans: Die verraaiers het teleurstellend besluit om met die kolonialiste te veg.
backtrans: The traitors decided disappointingly to fight with the colonialists.
